mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(alarm_status), 0) AS alarmStatus FROM turck_admin_alarm_history_table WHERE alarm_code = #{alarmCode} AND clear_status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO turck_admin_alarm_history_table( alarm_code , sensor_code , alarm_status , alarm_value , tag_value , clear_status , confirm_status , use_yn , create_date , create_user) VALUES ( #{alarmCode} , #{sensorCode} , #{alarmStatus} , #{historyAlarmValue} , #{historyTagValue} , 1 , 1 , 1 , NOW() , #{createUser})
mapper.select: SELECT Z.alarmStatus AS alarmStatus , COUNT(*) AS alarmCount FROM ( SELECT MAX(alarm_status) AS alarmStatus , C.sensor_code FROM turck_admin_alarm_master A LEFT JOIN turck_admin_tag_master B ON A.tag_code = B.tag_code LEFT JOIN turck_admin_sensor_master C ON B.sensor_code = C.sensor_code GROUP BY C.sensor_code ) Z GROUP BY Z.alarmStatus
